EmailTemplate.name: 202101_CH_Global_Webinar_Dealers_DataComm.202101_CH_Global_DataComm_Webinar_Emai
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date – Data Communications in Business and General Aviation Webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Join Honeywell’s Offering Management Director, Derek Mitchell, and Technical Sales Manager, Ed Borger, for our upcoming webinar – Data Communications in Business and General Aviation.
Designed specifically for our Honeywell dealers, this webinar will provide an overview of the Data Communication environment including the Future Air Navigation System (FANS), Protected Mode - Controller Pilot Data Link Communications (PM- CPDLC) and domestic US FANS. It will also address Honeywell´s solutions in the Business and General Aviation aftermarket for this airspace, specifically the Mark II + and Mark III Communications Management Unit (CMU´s).
After attending this webinar, you'll be well versed in identifying global opportunities for these upgrades, benefits for customers and compatible aircrafts. REGISTER NOW <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_ocz33R5JTdKW4tvkbqXW7w]]> This webinar is intended for Honeywell Channel Partners only, but please feel free to distribute to other members of your organization as you see fit. If this email was forwarded to you and you'd like to be notified about upcoming webinar events directly, please click here <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/eZ00DX02000IQn000Prq00G]]> to let us know!
